title: Request to delete a Pushy Token for the user
name: DeleteAuth

Success 200.description: true when the pushy token is deleted

title: Request to sign a user in the system
name: GetAuth

Success 200.description: true when the name is found and password matches

title: Request to insert a Pushy Token for the user
name: PutAuth

Parameter.description: the Pushy Token of the user identified in the JWT

Success 200.description: true when the pushy token is inserted

title: Request delete a user from a chat
name: DeleteChats
description: Does not delete the user associated with the required JWT but instead delelets the user based on the email parameter.

Parameter.description: the chat to delete the user from
the email of the user to delete

400: Invalid Parameter.description: "Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number"

title: Request to get the emails of user in a chat
name: GetChats

Success 200.description: The email for the member in the chat

400: Invalid Parameter.description: "Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number"

title: Request to get the chat IDs of an email
name: GetChats

Success 200.description: List of chat IDs where the email is a member of those chats
The chat IDs for the chats having the email

title: Request add a user to a chat
name: PutChats
description: Adds the user associated with the required JWT.

Parameter.description: the chat to add the user to

400: Invalid Parameter.description: "Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number"

title: Request to delete a contact from an email
name: DeleteConnections

Parameter.description: the email to delete a contact from
email contact associated with email_A to be deleted

title: Request to get contacts of an email
name: GetConnections

title: Request to add a contact to an email
name: PostConnections

Parameter.description: the email to be added with a contact
email contact to be added to email_A

title: Request to get chat messages
name: GetMessages
description: Request to get the 10 most recent chat messages from the server in a given chat - chatId. If an optional messageId is provided, return the 10 messages in the chat prior to (and not including) the message containing MessageID.

Parameter.description: (Optional) return the 15 messages prior to this message

Success 200.description: List of massages in the message table
The email of the user who poseted this message
The timestamp of when this message was posted

400: Invalid Parameter.description: "Malformed parameter. chatId must be a number"

title: Request to add a message to a specific chat
name: PostMessages
description: Adds the message from the user associated with the required JWT.

Parameter.description: the id of th chat to insert this message into

400: Invalid password.description: "Invalid password, password must has at least 6 characters and 1 uppercase letter!"

title: Request to send a user pin number to reset password
name: GetResetPassword

Success 200.description: Email with PIN code has been sent

title: Request to change a user's password
name: PutResetPassword

Success 200.description: Password of user has been successfully reset

400: Invalid password.description: "Invalid password, password must has at least 6 characters and 1 uppercase letter!"

title: Request weather data
name: GetWeather

Parameter.description: the zip code to get weather info from

400: Invalid Parameter.description: "Malformed parameter. Zip code must be a number"

description: This end point is a pass through to the Open Weather API.
